title: Norway’s $2.2 Trillion Wealth Fund Trims Biggest US Tech Stocks
description: Norway’s $2.2 trillion sovereign wealth fund trimmed its stakes in the biggest US tech firms, including its top holding Nvidia Corp., in the second half of 2025, according to a newly published list of holdings.
content: Norway’s $2.2 trillion sovereign wealth fund trimmed its stakes in the biggest US tech firms, including its top holding Nvidia Corp., in the second half of 2025, according to a newly published list of holdings.
